org.jppf.node.policy

Class ScriptedPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.node.policy.ExecutionPolicy
      • org.jppf.node.policy.ScriptedPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ScriptedPolicy
extends ExecutionPolicy
    A policy which executes an aribtrary script in its accepts() method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.jppf.node.policy.ExecutionPolicy

        ExecutionPolicy.AndRule, ExecutionPolicy.LogicalRule, ExecutionPolicy.NotRule, ExecutionPolicy.OrRule, ExecutionPolicy.XorRule

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected JobClientSLA clientSla
      The job's client side SLA, set at runtime by the server.
      protected boolean evaluationError
      Flag set if an error is raised while executing the script, to avoid evaluating the script again.
      protected String id
      A unique id given to this script, to allow caching its compiled version.
      protected int jobDispatches
      Number of nodes the job is already dispatched to.
      protected String language
      The script language to use.
      protected JobMetadata metadata
      The job's metadata, set at runtime by the server.
      protected String script
      The script to execute.
      protected JobSLA sla
      The job's server side SLA, set at runtime by the server.
      protected JPPFStatistics stats
      The server statistics.

      • ScriptedPolicy

        public ScriptedPolicy(String language,
              Reader scriptReader)
               throws IOException
        Initialize this policy with a script language and a script read from a reader.
        Parameters:
        language - the script language to use.
        scriptReader - a reader from which to read the script to execute.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any error occurs while reading the script from the reader.

      • ScriptedPolicy

              File scriptFile)
               throws IOException
        Initialize this policy with a script language and a script read from a file.
        Parameters:
        language - the script language to use.
        scriptFile - the file containing the script to execute.
        Throws:
        IOException - if any error occurs while reading the script from the reader.

        Description copied from class: ExecutionPolicy
        Determines whether this policy accepts the specified node.

        Parameters:
